title: A toddler lost in the woods is found asleep using family dog as a pillow
description: Police say a 2-year-old girl who walked away from her home in Michigan’s Upper Peninsula with two family dogs was found hours later asleep in the woods using one of the canines as a furry pillow

title: 9 deputies charged in death of man beaten in Memphis jail
description: Recently released court documents show that two Memphis jail deputies have been charged with second-degree murder in the death of a Black man who was having a psychotic episode and died in custody last fall after jailers punched, kicked and kneeled on ...

title: It's a fiesta at USPS
description: It’s a fiesta! The United States Postal Service has kicked off Hispanic Heritage Month with new festive pinatas stamps.

title: Quavo lobbies for gun violence prevention in D.C.
description: The Migos rapper lost his fellow band member and nephew Takeoff to a shooting in November 2022.

title: At least 1 killed when bus carrying high schoolers crashes on way to band camp
description: High school students from Long Island, New York, were on their way to band camp when their bus rolled over and crashed.

title: Iranian president's wife defends harsh hijab law violations
description: Jamileh Alamolhoda, the wife of the Iranian president, defended harsh penalties for hijab law violations amid protests.

title: Tests show drinking water is safe at a Minnesota prison, despite inmate concerns
description: State health officials have said that the drinking water at a Minnesota prison is safe after inmate and advocate concerns over the water’s quality prompted a new round of tests

title: 2 JetBlue planes reportedly struck by lasers near Boston, FAA says
description: Two JetBlue planes were hit with laser strikes near Boston on Thursday, the Federal Aviation Administration said.

title: Several Trump allies could be witnesses in Georgia election interference trial
description: Several high-level allies of former President Trump could potentially be called as witnesses in the first Georgia election interference trial starting Oct. 23.

title: Police searching day care for hidden drugs after tip about trap door: Sources
description: Police on Thursday returned to the New York City day care where a 1-year-old boy died following exposure to fentanyl to search for hidden drugs.

title: Tropical storm warnings issued on East Coast: What to expect
description: Tropical storm warnings have been issued from North Carolina to Maryland ahead of a system that's forecast to develop into Tropical Storm Ophelia on Friday.

title: WATCH:  Dad's visit to see daughter after she gives birth goes viral
description: "The fact that in that moment...he was just kind of sitting beside me, I just felt so warm, like I'm his little girl."

title: Man executed for the 1996 killing of a University of Oklahoma dance student
description: A man convicted of the 1996 killing of a University of Oklahoma dance student has been executed

title: Home sales fell again in August as homebuyers grapple with rising mortgage rates
description: Sales of previously occupied U.S. homes fell for the third month in a row in August, as higher mortgage rates, rising prices and a dearth of properties on the market shut out many would-be homebuyers

title: 3-year-old dies while crossing Rio Grande
description: The family was attempting to cross the river north of the floating marine barrier Texas Gov. Greg Abbott ordered authorities to install

title: Alex Murdaugh pleads guilty to 22 counts of financial fraud and money laundering
description: Alex Murdaugh pleads guilty to 22 counts of financial fraud and money laundering. He is serving life in prison for killing his wife and son.

title: Ancient 'power' palazzo on Rome's Palatine Hill reopens to tourists after 50 years
description: Tourists in Rome can now enjoy a “new” ancient attraction

title: Rupert Murdoch stepping down as chairman from Fox, News Corp.
description: Rupert Murdoch is stepping down as chairman of Fox Corporation and News Corp., Fox has announced.

title: US applications for jobless benefits fall to lowest level in nearly 8 months
description: U.S. applications for unemployment benefits fell to their lowest level in eight months last week as the labor market continues to show strength in the face of elevated interest rates

title: 3 South African Navy personnel killed in submarine incident
description: Three South African Navy personnel have been pronounced dead, and one senior officer remains in critical condition, following a deadly incident at sea near Cape Town.

title: WATCH:  Braves’ fan makes one-handed catch
description: Grady Rikard caught a homerun ball hit by Phillies’ player Nick Castellanos while holding his daughter.

title: Bank of England holds main interest rate steady after nearly two years of hikes
description: Bank of England holds main interest rate steady after nearly two years of hikes in wake of surprise fall in inflation

title: Man rescued dangling from California's highest bridge 700 feet above river
description: A 19-year-old man has been rescued dangling approximately 700 feet above a river in California after getting stuck there while his friend filmed the whole ordeal.

title: 3 South Africa navy personnel die after they are swept off a submarine deck
description: Three South African navy personnel have died and a senior officer is in critical condition after seven crew members of a submarine were swept off its deck and out to sea by big waves

title: Man dies after swarm of bees attacks him on porch of his own home
description: A 59-year-old man has died after he was attacked and stung by a swarm of bees on the porch of his own home.

title: Lebanon begins investigating shooting outside US Embassy that caused no injuries
description: Lebanese authorities have started an investigation into a shooting outside the heavily fortified U.S. Embassy in Lebanon

title: Russia strikes cities from east to west Ukraine, killing at least 2
description: Air alerts sounded again and again in Kyiv and residents headed to shelters early Thursday morning, as a massive Russian attack on at least six cities across Ukraine killed at least two people, started fires and wounded at least 21

title: WATCH:  Bulldozer frees bear trapped in dumpster
description: A curious bear was freed with the help of a bulldozer after climbing into a restaurant dumpster in New Mexico.

title: Under pressure over border, Biden administration to protect hundreds of thousands of Venezuelans
description: Under intense political pressure from fellow Democrats, the Biden administration has announced it is granting protection to hundreds of thousands of Venezuelans who are already in the country

title: Illinois man pleads guilty to trying to burn down planned abortion clinic
description: Prosecutors say a 73-year-old man has pleaded guilty to driving a car into a planned abortion clinic in eastern Illinois and trying to set the building on fire earlier this year

title: Sheriff says 9 deputies charged in death of man beaten in Memphis jail
description: A sheriff says nine Memphis jail deputies have been indicted in the death of a Black man who was having a psychotic episode and died in custody last fall after jailers punched, kicked and kneeled on his back during a confrontation

title: DeSantis talks Trump, Black history, Disney, state of GOP primary and more
description: DeSantis sought to contrast himself with Trump while defending against criticism of his campaign and speaking about his plan for the southern border and other issues

title: WATCH:  Street floods after water main break in upstate New York
description: A water main break in Troy, New York, sent water gushing down a residential street.

title: Judge sets trial date to decide how much Giuliani owes 2 election workers in damages
description: A judge has ordered a Dec. 11 trial date to determine what damages Rudy Giuliani will have to pay two former Georgia election workers he was found liable for defaming.
